entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, introduced as 'H ARRY POTTER' in the first line.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper and a wizard, introduced as 'Hagrid' who welcomes Harry to Diagon Alley.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: A hidden street in London that is home to many shops selling magical items, introduced by Hagrid as 'Welcome, to Diagon Alley.'

entities.name: cauldrons - all sizes
entities.description: A shop selling cauldrons of different materials and features, described with a sign hanging over them.

entities.name: apothecary's
entities.description: An apothecary's shop where a plump woman is doing her shopping.
